content.title: First blog(?) post!
content.textPre:
Hello! Welcome to my first blog post!
I don't actually think this page will become a blog, rather just place where I periodically place a cool picture I took and my insights on it. Or just not used at all since I am not really a blogger or anything like that. It might just become my testing site for new featues with the glass cards as well... Anyways thanks for reading!

content.title: Testing Image Feature #1
content.textPre:
Hey!
This is a new feature where I can place an image with a new blog entry and it will place it self dynamically?

content.title: Testing Image Feature #3
content.textPre:
Hey!
This is a new feature where I can place an image with a new blog entry and it will place it self dynamically? (v3)

 More tests to come soon!

content.title: Update on website
content.textPre:
Hello!

This is just a quick update on the website. Looks like I have finished most of what I want to accomplish for the blog page and will start working on trying to finish the content for the other pages as well. I might hook the data that is been shown here into a database if I am going to be writing here often but I am still not sure yet about that, so we will see.
There is still some issues/features that I might need to implement such as having images not always on the side of the card, and such. Anyways, I will update you guys here later!

-E.C

content.title: Testing Image Feature #4
content.textPre: New test of images in the card format! (finding the best size/Tailwind CSS settings to make blog posts with images look good in desktop and mobile views.)

content.title: Update on website
content.textPre:
Hello! Its been a while since I last worked on the website, and posted any updates on this blog section. I had been busy with my classes this fall semester so I was not able to work on the website as much as I did over the summer.
I have some free time this winter break so here's hoping that I finish/am satisfied with the website and its functionality before the spring semester starts.
I will try to keep an informal update log by posting here infrequently. Thanks!

-E.C.

content.title: Update on website #2
content.textPre:
Hey.
It's been a while again since I last updated the website. I just recently graduated, so now I am going to be focusing my time on looking for a job!

Since I have some more free time now that I am graduated I am planning on finally maybe filling out the last few pages of this website, but after that, I am pretty sure I wont be coming back here that often to make updates (like always). The website was mostly just time-killer/skill polisher for me, so its not too terribly important. I might change my mind in the future, but who knows.

See you guys later!
-E.C.
